definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: The word "collagen" is derived from kolla, the Greek word for glue.
sentences.chinese: 單詞“膠原蛋白”是從科拉所得，對膠希臘字。

sentences.english: As the matter of fact, collagen cannot be added to the skin topically.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，膠原蛋白不能局部地添加到皮膚中。

sentences.english: Collagen is the main ingredient of skin corium 72%.
sentences.chinese: 膠原蛋白是人體皮膚真皮層中的主要成分，佔72%。

sentences.english: The collagens are the most important components of extracellular matrix.
sentences.chinese: 膠原蛋白系細胞外基質中最主要的成分。

sentences.english: Is a professional production and sales of collagen casing manufacturers.
sentences.chinese: 是一家專業生產銷售膠原蛋白腸衣的廠家。
主營膠原蛋白腸衣產品。

sentences.english: The amount of collagen that is absorbed through the digestive system is "extremely little.
sentences.chinese: 通過消化系統吸收的膠原蛋白量是極小的。

sentences.english: Collagen and mucopolysaccharide give the skin moisturizer and firming effect.
sentences.chinese: 膠原蛋白與黏多糖體供給肌膚保溼成分與緊膚效果。

sentences.english: Hydrolyzed Collagen Type I & III is a multi-function product.
sentences.chinese: 水解膠原蛋白I型和III是一個多功能的產品。

sentences.english: As a kind of internationally-recognized nourishment, collagen has been popular throughout the world for decades.
sentences.chinese: 作爲國際公認的營養品，膠原蛋白已風靡世界數十年。

sentences.english: Method The HNG cells were cultured in collagen gels.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用膠原蛋白凝膠內培養。

sentences.english: The solubility and emulsification capability of hydrolyzed collagen were significantly improved.
sentences.chinese: 酶解後膠原蛋白的溶解性及乳化性均顯著提高。

sentences.english: The biosynthetic cornea is made from laboratory-constructed human collagen.
sentences.chinese: 人工眼角膜是以“重組人膠原蛋白”爲原料做成的。

sentences.english: We will extend our persistence in deer collagen to the humanistic cause.
sentences.chinese: 我們將會把鹿膠原蛋白的執着延伸到人道主義事業。

sentences.english: The effect of collagen and chitosan on aggregation property of pulp is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了膠原蛋白和殼聚糖對紙漿纖維絮聚性能的影響。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the degradation of vicryl mesh and vicryl-collagen mesh.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察薇喬網片及其膠原蛋白複合物的降解。

definition: to nourish one's skin/to maintain a youthful appearance
